1.content: MultiOS Release Preparation and Distribution Strategy
1.details: Create a comprehensive release strategy to make MultiOS downloadable and accessible to users

2.details:
Create installable distribution packages:
1. Create release archive with all components
2. Generate installation scripts for different platforms
3. Create portable/tarball distributions
4. Package documentation and guides

3.details:
Create user-friendly release materials:
1. Quick start guide
2. Installation instructions
3. System requirements
4. Download links and mirrors
5. Release notes and changelog

4.details:
Set up multiple distribution channels:
1. GitHub Releases with assets
2. Official website/download portal
3. Package repositories (apt, yum, etc.)
4. Docker container distribution
5. Cloud deployment options

5.details:
Validate release packages:
1. Test installation on clean systems
2. Verify all components work correctly
3. Test distribution downloads
4. Validate installation across platforms
5. Create automated testing for releases

6.details:
Create awareness and adoption materials:
1. Feature highlights and benefits
2. Technical specifications
3. Use case examples
4. Community guidelines
5. Support and feedback channels
